        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('.test-tooltip').tooltip();
            // find tags and remove
            // remove empty p tag
            $('p').each(function () {
                var $this = $(this);
                if ($this.html().replace(/\s|&nbsp;/g, '').length == 0)
                    $this.remove();
            });


            $(document).on('click','.advancedSearch',function (event) {
                console.log(event);
                $('.advancedSearchForm').toggle("slow");
            })

            $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
            String.prototype.bn_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/0/g,'à§¦')
                        .replace(/1/g,'à§§')
                        .replace(/2/g,'à§¨')
                        .replace(/3/g,'à§©')
                        .replace(/4/g,'à§ª')
                        .replace(/5/g,'à§«')
                        .replace(/6/g,'à§¬')
                        .replace(/7/g,'à§­')
                        .replace(/8/g,'à§®')
                        .replace(/9/g,'à§¯');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }



            String.prototype.en_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/à§¦/g,'0')
                        .replace(/à§§/g,'1')
                        .replace(/à§¨/g,'2')
                        .replace(/à§©/g,'3')
                        .replace(/à§ª/g,'4')
                        .replace(/à§«/g,'5')
                        .replace(/à§¬/g,'6')
                        .replace(/à§­/g,'7')
                        .replace(/à§®/g,'8')
                        .replace(/à§¯/g,'9');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-td-index]",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var filter = [];

                $(this).parents("form").find("[data-td-index]").each(function (index){
                    if ($(this).val().trim()!="" && $(this).val()!=null){
                        filter.push(
                                {
                                    "bn": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number(),
                                    "en": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number(),
                                    "td": $(this).data("td-index")
                                }
                        )
                     }
                })


                var trs = table.find("tbody tr");

                $.each(trs, function (index, tr) {
                    var rowShow = true;
                    $.each(filter, function (ind, val){
                        console.log(val);
                        var td = $(tr).find("td").get(val["td"]);
                        var text = $(td).text();

                        if (text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["en"]) > -1
                        || text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["bn"]) > -1){
                            rowShow = rowShow && true;
                        }else{
                            rowShow = false;
                        }
                    })
                    if (rowShow==true){
                        $(tr).show();
                    }else{
                        $(tr).hide();
                    }
                } )

            })

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-search]",function () {


                var searchContent = $(this).data("search");

                var filter1 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number();
                var filter2 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number();


                var rows = $(document).find(searchContent);


                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {

                    var row = rows[i];
                    if (row) {
                        if ($(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter1) > -1
                                ||$(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter2) > -1
                        ) {
                            $(row).show();
                        } else {
                            $(row).hide();
                        }
                    }
                }
            })

            $(document).find(".removableRowTable").each(function (index) {
                console.log($(this).find("tbody tr").length);
                $(this).find("tbody").each(function () {
                    if ($(this).find("tr").length<=1){
                        $(this).remove();
                    }
                })
            })


            $(document).on("reset","form",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var tr = table.find("tbody tr");
                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < tr.length; i++) {

                    tr[i].style.display = "";

                }
            })

        });

        $(document).ready(function($) {
            $('body').scrollToTop({
                distance: 200,
                speed: 1000,
                easing: 'linear',
                animation: 'fade', // fade, slide, none
                animationSpeed: 500,

                mobile: {
                    width: 768,
                    distance: 100,
                    speed: 1000,
                    easing: 'easeInOutElastic',
                    animation: 'slide',
                    animationSpeed: 200
                },

                trigger: null, // Set a custom triggering element. Can be an HTML string or jQuery object
                target: null, // Set a custom target element for scrolling to. Can be element or number
                text: '<i class="fa fa-chevron-circle-up" aria-hidden="true"></i>Top', // Text for element, can contain HTML

                skin: null,
                throttle: 250,

                namespace: 'scrollToTop'
            });
        });
        function validateForm(){
            var name=document.contactUsForm.name.value;
            var message=document.contactUsForm.message.value;
            var email=document.contactUsForm.email.value;

            if (name==null || name==""){
                alert("Name can't be blank");
                return false;
            }else if(email==null || email==""){
                alert("Email can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
            else if(message==null || message==""){
                alert("Message can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
        }

        });*/

<div class="col-md-11 boxed-layout " style="padding: 10px;width: 97%">
    <section class="bg-act-section padding-bottom-20">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                <div class="text-center">
                    <h3>

                        <span class='footnote'   title='Throughout this Act, except otherwise provided, the words â€œBangladeshâ€, â€œGovernmentâ€, â€œthe Governmentâ€ and â€œTakaâ€ were substituted, for the words â€œPakistanâ€, â€œCentral or any Provincial Governmentâ€ or â€œCentral Government or any Provincial Governmentâ€ or â€œCentral Governmentâ€ or â€œthe Provincial Governmentâ€ or â€œProvincial Governmentâ€ and â€œrupeesâ€ respectively by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973).'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'>1</sup></span></span>The Penal Code, 1860 

                        
                        
                    </h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            <h4 style="color: #fff;"> (
                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                            ACT
                                        
                                        NO. XLV OF 1860
                                    
                                

                                )
                            </h4>
                        
                    
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    <section class="bt-act-section-search ">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-bottom12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">

                                                                                 aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
                <p class="pull-right print-center publish-date">
                    [ 6th October, 1860   ]
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    
    <section
            class="padding-bottom-20 ">
        <div class="row margin-top-20 ">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 lineremove">
                <button class="printIco print-only pull-right" onclick="window.print();return false;"
                        style="width: 72px;height: 80px;"><i
                        class="fa fa-print" style="font-size: 40px;"></i></button>
                
                    
                    
                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="text-center act-role-style">
                                
                                <strong>
                                    

                                    
                                    
                                </strong>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row">
                            
                            <div class="col-md-12 pad-right">
                                <p>

                                    
                                    

                                    
                                    
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

    <section class="padding-bottom-20 bg-striped ">
        
        
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                
                    <div class="act-chapter-group">
                        
                            <p class="act-chapter-no">
                                
                                
                                    
                                
                                Chapter I

                                
                                
                            </p>
                        
                        
                            <p class="act-chapter-name" style="font-weight: bold;">
                                
                                INTRODUCTION

                                
                                
                            </p>
                        
                    </div>
                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            Preamble

                            
                            
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    WHEREAS it is expedient to provide a general Penal Code for Bangladesh; It is enacted as follows:-

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Title and extent of operation of the Code

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                     	1. This Act shall be called the  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œPenal Codeâ€ were substituted, for the words â€œPakistan Penal Codeâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >2</a></sup></span></span>[Penal Code], and shall take effect throughout Bangladesh.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Punishment of offences committed within Bangladesh

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	2. Every person shall be liable to punishment under this Code and not otherwise for every act or omission contrary to the provisions thereof, of which he shall be guilty within Bangladesh.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Punishment of offences committed beyond, but which by law may be tried within Bangladesh

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	3. Any person liable, by any Bangladesh Law, to be tried for an offence committed beyond Bangladesh shall be dealt with according to the provisions of this Code for any act committed beyond Bangladesh in the same manner as if such act had been committed within Bangladesh.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Extension of Code to extra-territorial offences

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    4. The provisions of this Code apply also to any offence committed by-	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	(1) any citizen of Bangladesh in any place without and beyond Bangladesh;	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(2) [Omitted by Article 2 and Schedule of the Central Laws (Adaptation) Order, 1961.]	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(3) [Omitted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the <a title='Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973' href='/act-430.html'>Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973</a> (Act No. VIII of 1973).]	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(4) any person on any ship or aircraft registered in Bangladesh wherever it may be.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Explanation.-In this section the word "offence" includes every act committed outside Bangladesh which, if committed in Bangladesh, would be punishable under this Code.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustrations	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(a)	A, a Bangladesh subject, commits a murder in Uganda. He can be tried and convicted of murder in any place in Bangladesh in which he may be found.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(b)	B, a European British subject, commits a murder in  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œRangpurâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œKahmirâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='3' >3</a></sup></span></span>[Rangpur]. He can be tried and convicted of murder in any place in Bangladesh in which he may be found.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(c)	C, a foreigner who is in the service of the Bangladesh Government, commits a murder in  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œKhulnaâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œJunagadhâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='4' >4</a></sup></span></span>[Khulna]. He can be tried and convicted of murder at any place in Bangladesh in which he may be found.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(d)	D, a British subject living in  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œKhulnaâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œJunagadhâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='5' >5</a></sup></span></span>[Khulna], instigates E to commit a murder in  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œChittagongâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œLahoreâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='6' >6</a></sup></span></span>[Chittagong]. D is guilty of abetting murder.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Certain laws not to be affected by this Act



                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    5. Nothing in this Act is intended to repeal, vary, suspend, or affect  <span class='footnote'  title='The words, figures, commas and semi colon â€œany of the provisions of the statute 3 & 4 William IV, Chapter 85, or of any Act of Parliament of the United Kingdom passed after that statute in anywise affecting the East Indian Company or Pakistan or the inhabitants thereof; orâ€ were omitted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >7</a></sup></span></span>[* * *] any of the provisions of any Act for punishing mutiny and desertion of officers, soldiers, sailors or airmen in the service of the  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œRepublicâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œStateâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='2' >8</a></sup></span></span>[Republic], or of any special or local law.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                
                    <div class="act-chapter-group">
                        
                            <p class="act-chapter-no">
                                
                                
                                    
                                
                                Chapter II

                                
                                
                            </p>
                        
                        
                            <p class="act-chapter-name" style="font-weight: bold;">
                                
                                GENERAL EXPLANATIONS

                                
                                
                            </p>
                        
                    </div>
                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Definitions in the Code to be understood subject to exceptions

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    		6. Throughout this Code every definition of an offence, every penal provision and every illustration of every such definition or penal provision, shall be understood subject to the exceptions contained in the chapter entitled "General Exceptions," though those exceptions are not repeated in such definition, penal provision or illustration.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustrations<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(a) The sections in this Code, which contain definitions of offences, do not express that a child under seven years of age cannot commit such offences; but the definitions are to be understood subject to the general exception which provides that nothing shall be an offence which is done by a child under seven years of age.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(b)	A, a police officer, without warrant, apprehends Z who has committed murder. Here A is not guilty of the offence of wrongful confinement; for he was bound by law to apprehend Z, and therefore the case falls within the general exception which provides that "nothing is an offence which is done by a person who is bound by law to do it".

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Sense of expression once explained

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	7. Every expression which is explained in any part of this Code is used in every part of this Code in conformity with the explanation.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Gender

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	8. The pronoun "he" and its derivatives are used of any person, whether male or female.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Number

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	9. Unless the contrary appears from the context, words importing the singular number include the plural number, and words importing the plural number include the singular number.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œManâ€
		â€œWomanâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	10. The word â€œmanâ€ denotes a male human being of any age: the word â€œwomanâ€ denotes a female human being of any age.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œPersonâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	11. The word â€œpersonâ€ includes any Company or Association, or body of persons, whether incorporated or not.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œPublicâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	12. The word â€œpublicâ€ includes any class of the public or any community.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	[Omitted]

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	13. [Omitted by Article 2 and Schedule of the Central Laws (Adaptation) Order, 1961.]

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œServant of the Stateâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	14. The words  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œServant of the Republicâ€ were substituted, for the words â€œServant of the Stateâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >9</a></sup></span></span>[Servant of the Republic] denote all officers or servant, continued, appointed or employed in Bangladesh by or under the authority of the Government.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	[Repealed]

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	15. [Repealed by the Government of India (Adaptation of Indian Laws) Order,  1937.]

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	[Repealed]

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	16. [Repealed by the Government of India (Adaptation of Indian Laws) Order,  1937.]

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œGovernmentâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	17. The word â€œGovernmentâ€ denotes the person or persons authorized by law to administer executive Government in Bangladesh, or in any part thereof.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	[Repealed]

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	18. [Repealed by the Government of India (Adaptation of Indian Laws) Order,  1937.]

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œJudgeâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    19. The word â€œJudgeâ€ denotes not only every person who is officially designed as a Judge, but also every person,-	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>who is empowered by law to give, in any legal proceeding, civil or criminal, a definitive judgment, or a judgment which, if not appealed against, would be definitive, or a judgment which, if confirmed by some other authority, would be definitive, or	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>who is one of a body of persons, which body of persons is 	empowered by law to give such a judgment.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustrations	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(a)	A Collector exercising jurisdiction in a suit under Act X of 1859, is a Judge.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(b)	A Magistrate exercising jurisdiction in respect of a charge on which he has power to sentence to fine or imprisonment with or without appeal, is a Judge.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(c)	[Repealed by the Federal Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act 1951 (Act XXXVI of 1951)].	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(d)	 A Magistrate exercising jurisdiction in respect of a charge on which he has power only to commit for trial to another Court, is not a Judge.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œCourt of justiceâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	20. The words "Court of Justice" denote a Judge who is empowered by law to act judicially alone, or a body of Judges which is empowered by law to act judicially as a body, when such Judge or body of Judges is acting judicially. 

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œPublic servantâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    21. The words "public servant" denote a person falling under any of the descriptions hereinafter following, namely:-		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	First.-[Omitted by section 2 of the Penal Code (Amendment) Ordinance, 1982 (Ordinance No. X of 1982)];		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Second. Every Commissioned Officer in the Military, Naval or Air Forces of Bangladesh  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œwhile serving under the Governmentâ€ were omitted by section 2 of the Penal Code (Amendment) Ordinance, 1982 (Ordinance No. X of 1982)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='2' >10</a></sup></span></span>[* *  *];		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	 <span class='footnote'  title='Clause Third was substituted, for clause Third by section 2 of the Penal Code (Amendment) Ordinance, 1982 (Ordinance No. X of 1982)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='3' >11</a></sup></span></span>[Third.- Every Judge including any person empowered by any law to perform, whether by himself or as a member of any body of persons, any adjudicatory function;] 		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Fourth.- very officer of a Court of Justice whose duty it is, as such officer, to investigate or report on any matter of law or fact, or to make, authenticate, or keep any document, or to take charge or dispose of any property, or to execute any judicial process, or to administer any oath, or to interpret, or to preserve order in the Court; and every person specially authorized by a Court of Justice to perform any of such duties;		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Fifth.-Every juryman, assessor, or member of a panchayat assisting a Court of Justice or public servant;		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Sixth.-Every arbitrator or other person to whom any cause or matter has been referred for decision or report by any Court of Justice, or by any other competent public authority;		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Seventh.-Every person who holds any office by virtue of which he is empowered to place or keep any person in confinement; 		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Eighth.-Every officer of the Government whose duty it is, as such officer, to prevent offences, to give information of offences, to bring offenders to justice, or to protect the public health, safety or convenience;		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Ninth.-Every officer whose duty it is, such officer, to take, receive, keep or expend any property on behalf of the Government, or to make any survey, assessment or contract on behalf of the Government, or to execute any revenue-process, or to investigate, or to report, on any matter affecting the pecuniary interests of the Government, or to make, authenticate or keep any document relating to the pecuniary interest of the Government, or to prevent the infraction of any law for the protection of the pecuniary interests of the Government  <span class='footnote'  title='The comma and words â€œ, and every officer in the service or pay of the Government or remunerated by fees or commission for the performance of any public dutyâ€ were omitted by section 2 of the Penal Code (Amendment) Ordinance, 1982 (Ordinance No. X of 1982)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='4' >12</a></sup></span></span>[* * *];		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Tenth.-Every officer whose duty it is, as such officer, to take, receive, keep or expend any property, to make any survey or assessment or to levy any rate or tax for any secular common purpose of any village, town or district, or to make, authenticate or keep any document for the ascertaining of the rights of the people of any village, town or district;		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Eleventh.-Every person who holds any office in virtue of which he is empowered to prepare, publish, maintain or revise an electoral roll or to conduct an election or part of an election.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustration		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	A Municipal Commissioner is a public servant.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	 <span class='footnote'  title='Clause Twelfth was added by section 2 of the Penal Code (Amendment) Ordinance, 1982 (Ordinance No. X of 1982)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='5' >13</a></sup></span></span>[Twelfth.-Every person-		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(a) in the service or pay of the Government or remunerated by the Government by fees or commissions for the performance of any public duty;		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(b) in the service or pay of a local authority or of a corporation, body or authority established by or under any law or of a firm or company in which any part of the interest or share capital is held by, or vested in, the Government.]		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Explanation 1.-Persons falling under any of the above descriptions are public servants, whether appointed by the Government or not.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Explanation 2.-Wherever the words "public servant" occur, they shall be understood of every person who is in actual possession of the situation of a public servant, whatever legal defect there may be in his right to hold that situation.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Explanation 3.-The word "election" denotes an election for the purpose of selecting members of any legislative, municipal or other public authority, of whatever character, the method of selection to which is by, or under, any law prescribed as by election.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œMoveable propertyâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    22. The words "moveable property" are intended to include corporeal property of every description, except land and thing attached to the earth or permanently fastened to any thing which is attached to the earth.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œWrongful gainâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    23. "Wrongful gain" is gain by unlawful means of property to which the person gaining is not legally entitled.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            	
	â€œWrongful lossâ€

                            
                            
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    "Wrongful loss" is the loss by unlawful means of property to which the person losing it is legally entitled.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            		Losing wrongfully.

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    A person is said to gain wrongfully when such person retains wrongfully, as well as when such person acquires wrongfully. A person is said to loss wrongfully when such person is wrongfully kept out of any property, as well as when such person is wrongfully deprived of property.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œDishonestlyâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    24. Whoever does anything with the intention of causing wrongful gain to one person or wrongful loss to another person, is said to do that thing "dishonestly".

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œFraudulently"

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    25. A person is said to do a thing fraudulently if he does that thing with intent to defraud but not otherwise.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œReason to believeâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    26. A person is said to have "reason to believe" a thing if he has sufficient cause to believe that thing but not otherwise.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Property in possession of wife, clerk or servant.

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    27. When property is in the possession of a person's wife, clerk or servant, on account of that person, it is in that person's possession within the meaning of this Code.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Explanation.-A person employed temporarily or on a particular occasion in the capacity of a clerk, or servant, is a clerk or servant within the meaning of this section.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œCounterfeitâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    28. A person is said to "counterfeit" who causes one thing to resemble another thing, intending by means of that resemblance to practice deception, or knowing it to be likely that deception will thereby be practiced.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Explanation 1.-It is not essential to counterfeiting that the imitation should be exact.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Explanation 2.-When a person causes one thing to resemble another thing, and resemblance is such that a person might be deceived thereby, it shall be presumed, until the contrary is proved, that the person so causing the one thing to resemble the other thing intended by means of that resemblance to practice deception or knew it to be likely that deception would thereby be practiced.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œDocumentâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    29. The word "document" denotes any matter expressed or described upon any substance by means of letters, figures, marks, or by more than one of those means, intended to be used, or which may be used, as evidence of that matter.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Explanation 1.-It is immaterial by what means or upon what substance the letters, figures or marks are formed, or whether the evidence is intended for, or may be used in a Court of Justice, or not.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustrations	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>A writing expressing the terms of a contract, which may be used as evidence of the contract, is a document.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>A cheque upon a banker is a document.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>A Power-of-Attorney is a document.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>A map or plan which is intended to be used or which may be used as evidence, is a document.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>A writing containing directions or instructions is a document.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Explanation 2.-Whatever is expressed by means of letters, figures or marks as explained by mercantile or other usage, shall be deemed to be expressed by such letters, figures or marks within the meaning of this section, although the same may not be actually expressed.	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustration	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	A writes his name on the back of a bill of exchange payable to his order. The meaning of the endorsement, as explained by mercantile usage, is that the bill is to be paid to the holder. The endorsement is a document, and must be construed in the same manner as if the words "pay to the holder" or words to that effect had been written over the signature.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œValuable securityâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	30. The words "valuable security" denote a document which is, or purports to be, a document whereby any legal right is created, extended, transferred, restricted, extinguished or released, or whereby any person acknowledges that he lies under legal liability, or has not a certain legal right.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustration<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>A writes his name on the back of a bill of exchange. As the effect of this endorsement is to transfer the right to the bill to any person who may become the lawful holder of it, the endorsement is a "valuable security".

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œA willâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    31. The words "a will" denote any testamentary document.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Words referring to acts include illegal omissions

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    32. In every part of this Code, except where a contrary intention appears from the context, words which refer to acts done extend also to illegal omissions.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	â€œActâ€	
	â€œOmissionâ€

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    33. The word "act" denotes as well a series of acts as a single act: the word "omissionâ€ denotes as well a series of omissions as a single omission.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Acts done by several persons in furtherance of common intention

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    34. When a criminal act is done by several persons, in furtherance of the common intention of all, each of such persons is liable for that act in the same manner as if it were done by him alone.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	When such an act is criminal by reason of its being done with a criminal knowledge or intention

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    35. Whenever an act, which is criminal only by reason of its being done with a criminal knowledge or intention, is done by several persons, each of such persons who joins in the act with such knowledge or intention is liable for the act in the same manner as if the act were done by him alone with that knowledge or intention.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Effect caused partly by act and partly by omission

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	36. Wherever the causing of a certain effect, or an attempt to cause that effect, by an act or by an omission, is an offence, it is to be understood that the causing of that effect partly by an act and partly by an omission is the same offence.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustration<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	A intentionally causes Z's death, partly by illegally omitting to give Z food, and partly by beating Z. A has committed murder.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Co-operation by doing one of several Acts constituting an offence

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
