                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Grievous hurt

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    320. The following kinds of hurt only are designated as "grievous":-		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Firstly.-Emasculation.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Secondly.-Permanent privation of the sight of either eye.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Thirdly.-Permanent privation of the hearing of either ear.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Fourthly.-Privation of any member or joint.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Fifthly.-Destruction or permanent impairing of the powers of any member or joint.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Sixthly.-Permanent disfiguration of the head or face.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Seventhly.-Fracture or dislocation of a bone or tooth.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Eighthly.-Any hurt which endangers life or which causes the sufferer to be during the space of twenty days in severe bodily pain, or unable to follow his ordinary pursuits.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Voluntarily causing hurt

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    321. Whoever does any act with the intention of thereby causing hurt to any person, or with the knowledge that he is likely thereby to cause hurt to any person, and does thereby cause hurt to any person, is said "voluntarily to cause hurt".

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Voluntarily causing grievous hurt

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    322. Whoever voluntarily causes hurt, if the hurt which he intends to cause or knows himself to be likely to cause is grievous hurt, and if the hurt which he causes is grievous hurt, is said â€œvoluntarily to cause grievous hurt".		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Explanation.-A person is not said voluntarily to cause grievous hurt except when he both causes grievous hurt and intends or knows himself to be likely to cause grievous hurt. But he is said voluntarily to cause grievous hurt, if intending or knowing himself to be likely to cause grievous hurt of one kind, he actually causes grievous hurt of another kind.		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Illustration		<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>A, intending or knowing himself to be likely permanently to disfigure Z's face, gives Z a blow which does not permanently disfigure Z's face, but which causes Z to suffer severe bodily pain for the space of twenty days. A has voluntarily caused grievous hurt.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Punishment for voluntarily causing hurt

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    323. Whoever, except in the case provided for by section 334, voluntarily causes hurt, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to one thousand taka, or with both.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
                
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
